column2: #than including player name (exclude direct games against one another)
lm(score ~ hero_name + color + rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC) %>% summary()
lm(formula = score ~ hero_name + color + rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC)
lm(score ~ hero_name + color * rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC) %>% summary()
lm(formula = score ~ hero_name + color * rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC)

lm(formula = score ~ hero_name * color + rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC)
lm(score ~ hero_name * rating_difference + color, data = matches_df_HN_MC) %>% summary()
lm(formula = score ~ hero_name * rating_difference + color, data = matches_df_HN_MC)
lm(score ~ hero_name * color * rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC) %>% summary()
lm(formula = score ~ hero_name * color * rating_difference, data = matches_df_HN_MC)
